name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display LinkedIn Post Date and Time

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace LinkedIn's relative post times with exact date and timestamp on your feed!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ever scroll through LinkedIn and wonder, "When was this actually posted?" Those fuzzy timestamps like "1w" or "2d" aren't exactly helpful, right?

Good news! With this extension, you can see the exact date and time every LinkedIn post was published.

Here's what it does:

ðŸ•’ Exact Dates & Times: No more guessing games. Know precisely when a post went live.
ðŸŽ¨ Customize the Display: Prefer just the date? Want the full date and time? You choose!
ðŸš€ Easy Integration: Just install it, and it works automatically in your LinkedIn feed.

How to Use?

Simply add the extension to Chrome, refresh your LinkedIn page, and that's it! If you'd like to see the time in your time zone, simply go to the extension settings and enable "Show Date and Time".
